name: Slotbot Arena
description:
Slotbot Arena

- Prototype SHMUP following the Ludum dare 44 theme:  Your Life is Currency!

- Fight in an arena against other robots.  All coin operated (weird huh?)

- Your starting form won't be enough.  Exchange bodies with enemies you've defeated to revive life and boost your power!

- Be mindful of where you're going, the coins only give so much time!  You'll have to rush to regenerate energy to earn coins (i'm sure some lore could be made up to explain that one!).  You wouldn't want to get stuck in front of an enemy when your character needs more energy, right?!

- 5 stages is all there is, but the final stage is the most difficult and I don't expect anyone to get through it.  Plus it's a prototype!

- Have fun!
